pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Relocate `node` module content
pullRequest.bodyText:
Moves node content from the Modules section to the
Configuring Elasticsearch section.
Supporting changes:

Retitles page Node settings
Increments several headings
Removes several unneeded [float] attributes
Replaces remaining [float] attributes with [discrete]
Updates the Other node settings section

Closes #53307

commit.message:
[DOCS] Relocate `node` module content

Moves `node` content from the [Modules][0] section to the
[Configuring Elasticsearch][1] section.

Supporting changes:
* Retitles page `Node settings`
* Increments several headings
* Removes several unneeded `[float]` attributes
* Replaces remaining `[float]` attributes with `[discrete]`
* Updates the `Other node settings` section

Relates to #53307

[0]: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/modules.html
[1]: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/master/settings.html

nodes.bodyText: This topic is our "source of truth" for node definitions and is referenced in customer agreements. I agree we need a "node settings" topic, but having our official node info under "node settings" is confusing. As a follow-on, we need to rework this to split apart the settings from the definitions. IOW, merging to master is fine, but the content needs to be reworked before it becomes "current".
